mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DEPT_ID ASC) RNUM, ORG_NAME, USER_ID, USER_NAME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, CLASS_ID, CLASS_NAME, GRADE_ID, GRADE_NAME FROM SSOX_USER WHERE SUBSTR(USER_STAT,0, 2) = 'AA' AND USE_YN = '1' AND USER_NAME LIKE #{USER_NAME} ||'%'

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DEPT_RANK ASC) RNUM, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, DEPT_RANK FROM ( SELECT DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, DEPT_RANK FROM SSOV_DEPT WHERE DEPT_ORDER = 4 AND DEPT_ID NOT IN ('3220192') AND DEPT_RANK IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, DEPT_RANK FROM SSOV_DEPT WHERE DEPT_ORDER = 3 AND DEPT_ID > '3220101' AND DEPT_SE = '0' AND DEPT_RANK IS NOT NULL AND DEPT_ID NOT IN ('3220119') )
